name: Castle Werewolf 3D
description: Welcome to the sinister castle "Werewolf" where are settled soldiers turned into a bloodthirsty shaggy monsters!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
